animeTitle: Hiatari Ryoukou! Yume no Naka ni Kimi ga Ita
animeDescription: The movie starts out with Katsuhiko going to the US, with Kasumi and Yusaku seeing him off at Narita.Two years later, Katsuhiko is a professional racer, and comes back to Japan to race (and to marry Kasumi). Yusaku's hobby is photography.(Source: AniDB)
animeCharacters: ['Takasugi, Yusaku', 'Kishimoto, Kasumi', 'Mikimoto, Shin', 'Muraki, Katsuhiko', 'Seki, Keiko', 'Mizusawa, Chigusa']
animeStaff: [['Sugii, Gisaburou', 'Producer, Script'], ['Adachi, Mitsuru', 'Original Creator'], ['Tanaka, Kouhei', 'Music'], ['Maeda, Minoru', 'Animation Director, Character Design']]
